
Campui: a Gui for Frank's Cam Demo
==================================

This is a really simple gui to demonstrate character recognition in
real-time.

Licence
-------
GPLv3

Instructions
------------
1) install mlboost
easy_install mlboost 

2) install PyQt4 (apt-get install pyqt4-dev-tools)
3) optional: install matplotlib (easy_install python2.5-matplotlib)
4) build the UI files
make

3) Enjoy!
digipy                  
digipy-features2D
digipy-see-data
digipy-extract-features
digipy-freq-analysis    
digipy-train
